content:
Nordstrom is known for its excellent customer service and return policy.

Yes, you can absolutely use your gift card to buy the Frye Melissa Tote online and then return it to a physical Nordstrom store if it doesn't fit you well. Nordstrom offers a free returns policy, which means you can return or exchange an item within 30 days of purchase.

Here's how it works:

1. Use your gift card to purchase the Frye Melissa Tote online at Nordstrom.com.
2. If the tote doesn't fit you well or meet your expectations, you can initiate a return or exchange within 30 days of purchase.
3. Take the tote to a physical Nordstrom store, along with the original packaging, tags, and receipt.
4. A sales associate will assist you with the return or exchange process.

Nordstrom's return policy is very customer-friendly, and they'll work with you to ensure you're satisfied with your purchase. If you decide to exchange the tote for a different size, color, or style, you can do so without any hassle.

Just keep in mind that you'll need to have the original receipt and packaging to process the return or exchange. Also, if you're returning the tote, you'll receive a refund in the original form of payment (in this case, your gift card).

I hope that helps! If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask.
